name: IdentityRequestRegistry
description: Identity Request Registry. Key agreements are logged here. Request for identity shares are added here.

eventDecorators.name: RequestClientAccepted
eventDecorators.description: Offchain eventEvent fired when a request has been confirmed by a client.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _accepted
parameterDecorators.description: Marks if the client granted permission.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: Client for which the request with the specified @param _id was launched.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Data consumer that initially launched this request.

parameterDecorators.name: _validators
parameterDecorators.description: The validators that should answer to this specific request.

eventDecorators.name: RequestClientRejected
eventDecorators.description: Offchain eventEvent fired when a request has been confirmed by a client.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _accepted
parameterDecorators.description: Marks if the client granted permission.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: Client for which the request with the specified @param _id was launched.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Data consumer that initially launched this request.

parameterDecorators.name: _validators
parameterDecorators.description: The validators that should answer to this specific request.

eventDecorators.name: RequestCreated
eventDecorators.description: Offchain eventEvent fired when a request has been added.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _requester
parameterDecorators.description: The provider address.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: The validated client.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestAttributeMap
parameterDecorators.description: Specifies the attributes that the provider wants to certify.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerValidator
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

parameterDecorators.name: _isPreauthorised
parameterDecorators.description: Indicates if the request was created using addPreauthroisedRequest function.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerClient
parameterDecorators.description: Will hold a value only if @param _isPreauthorised is false.

eventDecorators.name: RequestVerified
eventDecorators.description: Offchain eventEvent fired when a request was verified.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeValidatorConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm generated by validator.

parameterDecorators.name: _hashedDataWithSharedSecret
parameterDecorators.description: A message signed with AES-CMAC(requestMasterHash, secret) for this request.

parameterDecorators.name: _dataConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Data consumer that initially launched this request.

functionDecorators.name: addPreauthorisedRequest
functionDecorators.description: Creates a preauthorised request with auto generated index.Requires fee payment directly in the smart contract. KeyExchangeConsumerValidator Is computed with provider's privateKey.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: The validated client.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestAttributeMap
parameterDecorators.description: Specifies the attributes that the provider wants to certify.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerValidator
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

returnDecorators.name: _id
returnDecorators.description: of the newly created request request.

functionDecorators.name: addPreauthorisedRequestFeeless
functionDecorators.description: Creates a preauthorised request with auto generated index. Index is returned.KeyExchangeConsumerValidator Is computed with provider's privateKey.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: The validated client.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestAttributeMap
parameterDecorators.description: uses the bitmask to specify the attributes required.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerValidator
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

returnDecorators.name: _id
returnDecorators.description: Id of the newly created request request.

functionDecorators.name: addRequest
functionDecorators.description: Creates an empty request with auto generated index.Requires fee payment directly in the smart contract. KeyExchangeConsumerValidator Is computed with provider's privateKey.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: The validated client.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestAttributeMap
parameterDecorators.description: Specifies the attributes that the provider wants to certify.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerValidator
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerClient
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

returnDecorators.name: _id
returnDecorators.description: Id of the newly created request request.

functionDecorators.name: addRequestFeeless
functionDecorators.description: An empty request with auto generated index is created. Index is returned.KeyExchangeConsumerValidator Is computed with provider's privateKey.

parameterDecorators.name: _client
parameterDecorators.description: The validated client.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestAttributeMap
parameterDecorators.description: uses the bitmask to specify the attributes required.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerValidator
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeConsumerClient
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by provider.

returnDecorators.name: _id
returnDecorators.description: Id of the newly created request request.

functionDecorators.name: grantPermission
functionDecorators.description: Response for request from client with key exchange. updates the request object associated with the ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeClientConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Part of the Diffie-Hellman symmetric key exchange algorithm. Generated by client.

functionDecorators.name: grantPermissionFeeless
functionDecorators.description: Response for request from client with key exchange. updates the request object associated with the ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

functionDecorators.name: pause
functionDecorators.description: Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state.Overrides base function with permissioned access.

functionDecorators.name: performFeelessTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Only the certSign owner can call this function. Signed transactions are passed to this function.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: setDappManager
functionDecorators.description: Needed to move the DappManager here due to the fact that only the owners can call performFeelessTransaction.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: unpause
functionDecorators.description: Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state.Overrides base function with permissioned access.

functionDecorators.name: verifyRequest
functionDecorators.description: Response for request from validator with Validator-Provider's key agreement. SharedSecret is computed from KA1 and KA2 with private key.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the request (auto incremented in the requests mapping).

parameterDecorators.name: _keyExchangeValidatorConsumer
parameterDecorators.description: Is computed with provider's privateKey.

parameterDecorators.name: _hashedDataWithSharedSecret
parameterDecorators.description: Obtained from a AES-CMAC(hashOfData, sharedSecret).
